map

Class MapPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • map.MapPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MapPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Specialized JPanel that displays a WorldWind map of the world.
    Author:
    Scott Rixner, Stephen Wong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        protected void insertBeforeCompass(gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.Layer layer)
        Insert layer just beneath the Compass layer.
        Parameters:
        layer - - layer to insert

      • addRightClickAction

        public void addRightClickAction(IRightClickAction rightClick)
        Add an action to be performed upon a right click on the map. Attempting to add the same action object more than once will have no effect. A previously removed action can be re-added. The Point object that is given to the IRightClickAction has been modified so that its getAltitude() method returns the eye point altitude at the time of the right click. getElevation() still returns the vertical position of the ground at that location.
        Parameters:
        rightClick - - desired action

      • removeRightClickAction

        public void removeRightClickAction(IRightClickAction rightClickAction)
        Remove an action that is being performed upon a right click on the map. No-op if the given IRightClickAction was not previously added. The action object can be re-added later if desired.
        Parameters:
        rightClickAction - - a IRightClickAction that was previously added by addRightClickAction

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(gov.nasa.worldwind.geom.Position pos,
               boolean fly)
        Set the position of the map to the indicated position. If "fly" is true, the map will animate from the current position to the indicated position, otherwise it will jump there immediately.
        Parameters:
        pos - - desired destination position
        fly - - fly if true, jump if false

      • addMapLayer

        Remove a layer from the map
        Parameters:

      • insertAtLayer

        public void insertAtLayer(gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.Layer layer,
                 java.lang.Class<?> layerType,
                 boolean insertBefore)
        Insert the given Layer before or after the first occurrence of the given layer type.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to insert
        layerType - The type of layer to insert before or after
        insertBefore - Boolean that if true, will all insertion before the given type and if false, will insert after the type has been encountered.

      • insertAtLayer

        public void insertAtLayer(gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.Layer layer,
                 gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.Layer targetLayer,
                 boolean insertBefore)
        Insert the given layer before or after the first occurrence of the given layer object
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to insert
        targetLayer - The layer before or after which the given layer will be inserted
        insertBefore - Boolean that if true, will all insertion before the given type and if false, will insert after the type has been encountered.
